attributes.action: Mcdonalds breakfast to be served until 12pm (or all day)
attributes.additional_details:
We know the times for McDonalds breakfast, and they are:
Monday-Sunday: 5am-10.30am 
Please refer to the McDonalds website for more information.
attributes.background: I love McDonalds breakfast & know a lot of people who do too, but we are tasked with the problem of staying up until 5am or getting up at 9am (sometimes both!) for a nice McMuffin!
